issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

The broker is started as

    broker = new BrokerService();
    new StatisticsBrokerPlugin().installPlugin(broker.getBroker());
    broker.setPersistent(false);
    broker.setUseJmx(false);
    broker.addConnector("tcp://127.0.0.1:" + ACTIVEMQ_OPENWIRE_PORT);
    broker.start();

comments.body:
I seem to have the same problem with ActiveMQ 5.8.0. It occurs out of the blue (no preceding errors at or above INFO level) and doesn't go away until the broker is restarted.

{code}

No test case to try and reproduce on the current broker code.

We also just started seeing this same error in our production broker, it seems to happen sporadically, as some services are still able to connect to the broker fine, but when running clients from within an IDE they are always failing

{code}
